text: A wonderful student from all nationalities.  A great friendlier management staff.  Wish all the best for all our students to be successful in academic, career and life.  All the best.

Well it was a great experience to study in Birmingham Academy especially to attend Vishnu sir class it's something very excited the Aura of the class was something so so awesomastic so thank you Vishnu sir and Birmingham Academy

The lecturers are experienced and come from the Hospitality industry in Singapore and overseas. Their knowledge and experiences at their past jobs made our lessons enjoyable. Unlike others, this Academy provides a pathway for a top-up final year degree course at UK's De Montfort's University. UK now allows undergraduate students to work 20 hours a week which is useful in terms of gaining real-work experience in the field of hospitality.
